name: Liquid Castile Soap - Small
description:
Our liquid soap is made with nothing but natural olive oil and distilled water. This Castile soap ensures your skin stays clean and soft. Silky feel and matte finish.

If you would like a custom scent, feel free to contact us.

8 ounces.

name: Animal Soap
description:
Our very popular and fun animal soap is now available online!

Offered in many shapes, scents, and colors. 
Stop in the store for even MORE colors and animals!

name: The Bubble Bar
description:
This Shea butter bar has fun, overflowing glycerine bubbles!
The scent is passion fruit with a twist of pineapple.

name: Heel & Sole Foot Balm
description:
A thick balm made with Shea butter, beeswax, and a special blend of oils. 
Apply this to clean dry feet. We suggest applying it before bed and putting socks on to let the balm soak in and work its magic. 

This product was crafted to repair, refresh, and moisturize your feet, heel to toe. 

Use after our Heel & Sole Sparkling Foot Soak and Foot Scrub for absolutely fantastic results!

name: Heel & Sole Sparkling Foot Soak
description:
It's time for your piggies to relax and rejuvenate! Pour two tablespoons in warm water and let your feet soak it in. 

The peppermint vanilla scent is both soothing and refreshing. 

Follow with our Heel & Sole Foot Scrub and Foot Balm for maximum pedi-repair!

4 oz.

name: Heel & Sole Foot Scrub
description:
Treat your hardworking feet to a soothing, all-natural foot scrub.

Crafted with a special blend of oils and Dead Sea minerals, rub a small amount directly on your feet to deeply exfoliate and moisturize.

The Peppermint Vanilla scent is both soothing and rejuvenating.
Use after our Heel & Sole Foot Soak for maximum softness!

4 oz.

name: Wooden Soap Trays
description:
Handcrafted wooden soap trays keep your soap lasting about twice as long by drying  and hardening it in between uses. 

Available in light pine and dark oak.

name: Bay Rum
description: Light, spicy, sweet and masculine aroma. The Bay Rum essential oil is known for its use by dukes and lords from "way back when!"

name: Teak
description: A solid white bar crafted with goat's milk and apricot seed. Teak is a light, spicy, woodsy scent.

name: Conditioning Beard Oil
description:
Our beard conditioner is handcrafted with a blend of special natural oils to soften and condition facial hair to prevent breakage and promote growth. Has a soft, masculine aroma of cedar wood.

2 oz. bottle, perfect for transport.   

Made with Sweet Almond Oil, Jojoba Oil, Avocado Oil and Cedarwood Essential Oil.

name: Cranberry Fig
description:
For a Limited Time only! 

For the holiday season, we bring you a tart cranberry scent with warm smoothing fig to complement our Cranberry Fig Soy Candles.

name: Secret Crush
description: A beautiful peach&cream marbled bar with a frosted glittery top. The scent is reminiscent of peaches and champagne.

name: Tweed
description: An incredible masculine scent! Spicy-sweet blend of French verbena and lemon, a green Florentine iris and violet leaves, and sublime notes of Mysore sandalwood and ambergris.

name: Green Tea & Cucumber
description: A refreshing bar handcrafted with brewed green tea. The unique scent is light, fresh, and quenching.

name: Mint with Dead Sea Salts
description: This bar is quickly becoming a top seller! Crafted with eucalyptus mint and Dead Sea salt crystals to create a rejuvenating and skin-healing experience.

name: Chocolate Mint
description: A new dark chocolate mint bar that looks good enough to eat. Crafted with coconut, olive, and palm oils with a peppermint essential oil.

name: Honey Oat Body Soap
description: A beautiful guest-sized bar with toasted oats for light exfoliation. Incredibly moisturizing. Fantastic for the body, face, and hands.

name: Spearmint Sage
description: Crafted with spearmint that is grown just a few doors down!

name: White Tea with Ginger
description: Our new white tea soap is made with coconut, palm, and olive oil and has beautiful copper veining.

name: Boyfriend Soap
description:
We have taken that much loved scent from our popular "Boyfriend in a Jar" candles and created a soap! 
Enjoy the masculine, modern, and clean smell of "Boyfriend" in this all-natural bar.

name: Men's Shaving Soap Jar
description: Our Original Scent Shaving Soap with a facial clay for extra slip and a mini facial.  You will love how you skin feels

name: Z's Special Normal To Oily Face Soap
description: Designed for Z.  Made with Peppermint, Cinnamon, Toasted Oats and Bentonite Clay.

name: Dopio Soap
description: Made with Coffee and Coffee Butter.  What a great way to wake up!

name: Rosemary Mint Shampoo Bar (Normal to Dry)
description: Made with Cruelty Free Silk and Organic Cage Free Eggs.  Your hair will thank you!

name: Aloe Lemongrass
description: Fill your senses with the soothing scent of Lemongrass with added moisture of aloe butter.

name: Key West Soap
description:
A great mix of Coconut, lime, sea water and sand make this bar a must have!.  It is made with sea water through out and sand in the top.

Limited Edition

name: Men's Shaving Soap Refill
description: A wonderful shaving soap with a facial clay to give you extra slip and a mini facial.  In 4 great scents.

name: Spa Bar with Dead Sea Salt
description:
Our beautiful shell shaped Spa Bar soap is bubbly and filled with soothing Dead Sea Salts.  A wonderful Yuzu Fruit scent fills your bath with the tropics.

5 ounce bar.

name: Bergamot Tea Tree Shampoo Bar (Normal to Oily)
description: Made with Cruelty Free Silk and Organic Cage Free Eggs.  Your hair will love you!

name: Goat & Honey Body Soap
description: A wonderful blend of Goat Milk and Real Honey.  Creamy, dreamy. Light Honey Scent

name: Normal To Oily Face Soap
description: A great glycerin soap with Tea Tree, Sea Kelp and Bentonite Clay designed to thoroughly clean your face.

name: Normal To Dry Face Soap
description: A creamy mixture of Goat Milk and Shea Butter with kaolin clay designed to clean and leave your skin soft.

name: Olive Oil Body Soap
description: Our wonderful 20% Extra Virgin Olive Oil soap.  Creamy, bubbly and moisturizing.

name: Room & Linen Spray
description: An all-natural mist to freshen up your home. Safe for linen, clothes, carpet, and even pets' fur. 4 ounces with a mister. Would you like a different scent? Feel free to contact us.

name: Argan Oil
description:
SOLD OUT - BACK ORDER AVAILABLE IF PURCHASED
A 100% pure, natural Moroccan oil dubbed "liquid gold" for its incredible skin benefits. Benefits of Argan Oil include: -reduces appearance of premature aging and "crow's feet" -freshens and softens skin better than chemically-created products -improves the elasticity of the skin, making it firmer -reduces skin irritation -regulates the secretion of sebum which makes oily skin much more manageable -helps prevent stretch marks -helps reduce the appearance of red bumps (acne, psoriasis, chicken pox) Use on clean skin daily. A little goes a long way. One ounce in an airless pump container.

name: Face Cream with Argan Oil
description: Our maximum quality facial serum is all-natural and made with Argan Oil, a natural Moroccan oil dubbed "liquid gold" for its incredible skin benefits. Benefits of Argan Oil include: -reduces appearance of premature aging and "crow's feet" -freshens and softens skin better than chemically-created products -improves the elasticity of the skin, making it firmer -reduces skin irritation -regulates the secretion of sebum which makes oily skin much more manageable -helps prevent stretch marks -helps reduce the appearance of red bumps (acne, psoriasis, chicken pox) We have taken this this great ingredient and transformed it into a lightweight, natural face serum that can be used twice a day for the best results. Use on clean skin once or twice daily. A little goes a long way. One ounce in an airless pump container.

name: Milk Bath
description:
Milk's proteins and vitamins are incredible for your skin. Just one scoop of our handcrafted milk bath mixture will keep your body moisturized and nourished. 
The raspberry tints your water pink; the chocolate is made with real Hershey's cocoa; the Milk & Honey is great for extra dry skin.

Makes 8-12 milk baths. 20 oz.

name: Liquid Castile Soap - Large
description: Our liquid soap is made with nothing but natural olive oil and distilled water. This Castile soap ensures your skin stays clean and soft. Silky feel and matte finish. If you would like a custom scent, feel free to contact us. 16 ounces.

name: Brown Sugar Scrub
description:
One of our best selling products! You can have INCREDIBLY soft skin using all-natural ingredients. 
Our oil blend contains grapeseed oil which is known to repair and replenish the skin while softening. 
Use this scrub 1-2 times a week full body for wonderful skin. Now available in two scents; our herbal original and sweet mandarin. 

9 full ounces.

name: Aloe Butter
description:
100% all-natural aloe butter. A soft-solid that melts immediately with contact of the skin. Extremely moisturizing. Soothe your skin after a day in the sun- this butter helps heal skin after a burn. 

2 ounce jar.

name: Jewelweed Tincture
description: Halt poison ivy in its tracks! Nature's only remedy for poison ivy. Also great as an acne treatment. Jewelweed is best known for its skin healing properties. The leaves and the juice from the stem of Jewelweed are used by herbalists to cure poison ivy and other plant-induced rashes, as well as many other types of dermatitis. Jewelweed works by counteracting the chemicals in other plants that cause irritation. Poultices and salves from Jewelweed are a folk remedy for bruises, burns, cuts, eczema, insect bites, sores, sprains, warts, and ringworm. Directions: Spritz directly onto skin or onto a cotton swab. Leave on skin until dry. Use 2-3 times daily until healed. Do not use mister directly on face. 2 ounce blue glass bottle with mister.

name: Gold Label Hand & Body Lotion - Travel Size
description:
The GOLD goes on light and silky smooth and absorbs quickly. Contains Evening Primrose which has been recognized for its anti-inflammatory and anti-oxidant properties. 

2 ounce bottle with cap, perfect for travel.

name: Gold Label Hand & Body Lotion
description:
The GOLD goes on light and silky smooth and absorbs quickly. Contains Evening Primrose which has been recognized for its anti-inflammatory and anti-oxidant properties. 

8 ounce bottle with locking pump.

name: Blue Label Hand & Body Lotion
description:
Our NATURAL lotion with Green Tea & Tea Tree Oil. 
Green tea extract helps to improve overall skin complexion and contains an antioxidant proven 200 times more powerful than Vitamin E.
Tea tree oil's antibacterial properties radically promote skin health and helps to reduce skin irritations and blemishes.
Perfect for daily application over your entire face and body.

8 ounce bottle with locking pump.

name: Solid Lotion Bar
description:
A solid lotion that is easily portable and stored with no messy liquids. 

The Fresh Vanilla, Pomegranate, Kumquat, Peppermint & White Tea bars contain beeswax and jojoba oil for a lighter feel, making it great for everyday use. 
The coffee butter bar contains mango butter, Shea butter, and coffee butter for antioxidants that protect and heal the skin, making it perfect for cracked, dry skin. 

Keep out of prolonged direct sunlight.
1 ounce in a push tube.

name: Tub Tingle
description:
All of our bath bombs are handmade using milks, butters, grape seed oil and essential oils to create a relaxing tingling bath. Soften and repair your skin while pleasing your body. Drop one Tub Tingle in your bath and rejuvenate your senses. 

5 ounces.

options.name: Sage Lemongrass (will tint your water green)

name: Women's Shaving Butter
description: Love your legs! Weve added grape seed oil to a soap base and whipped it into a silky shaving butter that will leave your skin unbelievably soft. Anywhere you shave, use our shaving butter to improve slip and reduce razor drag that causes red, irritated skin. We think you will love the fresh scent so much that you might just want to shave every day.

name: Large Soy Candle - Wood Wick
description:
Our large candle creates a beautiful wide wax pool for better scent throw. Our most popular "crackling" wood wick. 

16 ounces. Approximately 60 hours.

name: Medium Soy Candle - Wood Wick
description:
Our large candle creates a beautiful wide wax pool for better scent throw. Our popular "crackling" wood wick. 

12 ounces. Approximately 40 hours.

name: Votive Soy Candle - Wood Wick
description:
Our large candle creates a beautiful wide wax pool for better scent throw. Your choice of raw cotton or a "crackling" wood wick. 

2 ounces. Approximately 16 hours.

name: Large Soy Candle - Cotton Wick
description:
Our soy wax candle creates a beautiful wide wax pool for better scent throw. Classic raw cotton wick. 

16 ounces. Approximately 60 hours.

name: Medium Soy Candle - Cotton Wick
description:
Our large candle creates a beautiful wide wax pool for better scent throw. Classic raw cotton wick.

12 ounces. Approximately 40 hours.

name: Votive Soy Candle - Cotton Wick
description:
Our large candle creates a beautiful wide wax pool for better scent throw. Your choice of raw cotton or a "crackling" wood wick.

2 ounces. Approximately 18 hours.

name: African Black Soap
description: Handcrafted in Ghana, West Africa. We get this through the Fair Trade Agreement. Made with Unrefined Shea Butter. It helps relieve scalp irritations and rashes.

name: All-Natural Laundry Soap
description:
Our Laundry Soap contains our handcrafted soap, and has no petroleum or preservatives like detergent. 

Use one tablespoon per load for HE washing machines, and two tablespoons for all other machines.
(We also suggest using half your normal amount of fabric softener if switching from a laundry detergent.)

20 ounces.

name: Shea Butter
description:
Derived from the African shea tree that grows wild in the West Africa.  Shea butter helps beautify the skin by reducing the visibility of fine lines, scars, and stretch marks, and eases skin irritations such as psoriasis, eczema and sunburn. Its moisturizing qualities leave your skin incredibly soft.

2 ounce jar. Unrefined and 100% natural.

name: Foaming Liquid Castile Soap
description:
Our liquid soap is made with nothing but natural olive oil and distilled water. This Castile soap ensures your skin stays clean and soft. Silky feel and matte finish. 

Available in five wonderful scents.

name: Men's Shaving Brush
description:
Every brush is a gorgeous individual: carefully hand carved in Mishawaka out of wood and acrylic. 
Badger hair bristles, the best option in shaving brushes. 

Purchase a matching razor and brush set and receive a complementary silver stand to keep them in prime shape.

Pair with our all-natural Men's Shaving Soap Jar for the perfect combination in shaving. 

Please call us or stop in to see which colors/types of brushes we have in stock.

name: Assorted Beer Soap
description:
Receive a selection of handcrafted beer soap. We craft this soap from locally brewed beer from the Kettleheads microbrewery. Because we make this soap in small batches and have limited quantity of each beer, you will receive assorted soaps from our current collection. 

Previous beer soaps include:
Chocolate Stout
Indian Pale Ale
Winona Wobble
Skid Mark
Raspberry
Scottish Ale
